ComicInfo.Title: Universal Law, Book Three: Motorchrist
ComicInfo.Summary:
The series' final issue concludes the 3-part "Universal Law." Mr. Majestic must face the consequences of his actions as a cosmic being that once used his own power to create life is now threatening to destroy the very center of the Universe! The very origins of existence are explored in Mr. Majestic's greatest adventure!
